title: Bird guano is a phosphorus reservoir

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following questions(s) refer to the following elements. 
(A) Carbon 
(B) Sodium 
(C) Sulfur 
(D) Phosphorus 
(E) Potassium
content.question: Guano from fish-eating birds is a commercial source of this element.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
